Section.name: About IPLC
Section.description:
Indira Priyadharsini Law college, Andhra Pradesh is located in Ongole city of Prakasam District Andhra Pradesh. The college provides state of the art infrastructure to its students. The college gives education to the students with an objective of creating talented law professionals in India. The college aims at motivating as many people as possible to realize the importance of law and learn it. Legal profession offers immense scope in not only tackling legal problems through judicial settlements but also by establishing alternate dispute resolution systems. The college imparts legal education not only by its classroom lectures but also by exposing its students with practical approach and programmes.
